programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Last year was chaotic but it wouldn’t be right if we didn’t try to throw a wrench into our plans once again. Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Dirty Bird.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Bow season is finally here and the boys are at the Dirty Bird in Oklahoma. Randy is chasing a buck he named "The Camp Buck" because of how close the buck is to camp. If Randy can get it done this will be his biggest buck to date in Oklahoma.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: With a laundry list of things to do on the Dirty Bird, Randy finds himself in a pickle when Cody just up and disappears.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: With two weeks until the opener of Missouri archery season, Randy and Cody are trying to do everything they can to have the Raven prepped for the first bow camp.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: It’s the opening week of rifle camp and everyone is ready to go. Big Hoss has a close encounter with a big eight point and Cody finds himself having a little Déjà vu when a big buck walks out into the same plot he killed in last year.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Randy and Cody are all hands-on deck at the Raven. Things are coming down to the wire with bow season just around the corner. With just over a week left they are trying to get everything wrapped up before the first bow camp.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Josh and his wife Anna celebrate the first day of summer by taking their daughters out for a fun-filled day on the water.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Captain Josh and the fam head out to do some surf fishing to see what’s biting. Then ended the day building professional sand castles and playing goofy golf.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Ike on Stripers Bassmaster legend Mike Iaconelli joins Nick in a wild time chasing down striped bass blitzes off the Jersey Coast, getting bent rods from the boat and surf.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Nick joins Capt. Dave DeGenarro as lightning quick bonito invade New Jersey waters for fast-paced, reel-burning action on light tackle.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali and Rush head to Everglades City Florida to meet up with local Capt. Jimmy Wheeler of the Everglades Fishing Company to get a taste of what the saying "Old Florida" really means. With the SeaVee 270Z bay boat in tow, the guys look to Jimmy to put them on the bite, fishing the shallow inshore wrecks and rock piles for Snook, Grouper, and Cobia.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali and Rush head to the Bay Flats Lodge in Seadrift Texas to fish the vast shallow water marshes of the San Antonio Bay for Redfish. With thousands of acres of lowland creeks and pools to explore, this premier lodge has the tools and techniques it takes to get the guys their shots at this skinny water species.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: Ali and Rush head to Merritt Island, the sleepy space coast town where Ali was first introduced to fishing in Florida. Hoping to partake in a specialized fishery termed "fishing the other side," the guys will need calm weather, a serious boat, and a capable crew if they are going to have a shot at the yellowfin tuna that cruise the edge of the gulf stream current 100 plus miles off the coast.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: In a move to scratch one off the destination bucket list, Ali and Rush reunite with old friend Juan Spragge at the Toucan Lodge in Panama's Gulf Of Chiriqui. With close access to Hannibal bank and the islands of Montuosa and Coiba, the guys target mahi, marlin and tuna while enjoying the secluded comfort and hospitality of this unique family run lodge

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The Panama adventure continues as Ali and Rush switch their focus to the inshore possibilities at the Tucan Lodge in the Gulf Of Chiriqui. With numerous islands, pinnacles, and structures to work live baits and lures, the guys target species such as rooster fish, mullet snapper, and the king of the bottom... the Cubera Snapper.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The word is out! The Southern California Bluefin Tuna fishing is on fire and the waters of San Diego are literally Foaming with Life. Ali and Rush switch their targets from the jumbo size Bluefin Tuna to a smaller, medium grade fish for non-stop run and gun action. But, with so many fish fixated on the masses of bait in the area, it may take a million casts to pull one out of the froth.

programme.title: saltwater experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Sam Milazzo to find the elusive daytime Swordfish but run into some great Dolphin fishing on the way.

programme.title: saltwater experience
programme.desc: "Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor patiently pursue big tarpon from the Everglades to the Middle Keys with fly rod in hand."

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Richard Black for an exciting adventure in Key Largo, catching a wide variety of fish species on the shallow reef.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Jeff Malone to find a frenzy of exciting Bluefish near Marathon, FL.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Jeff Malone to find a productive wreck with which they enjoy the exciting variety of fish that wrecks can provide.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by marine scientist Nick Castillo to search for bonefish in Key Largo for both fun and study.

programme.title: Captain's Log
programme.desc: Captains Jonathan Moss and Will Osborne head out of Cortez Fl, to fish the south end of Tampa Bay.

programme.title: Local Knowledge
programme.desc: The Odyssea Sportfishing family grows as Casey Villone comes aboard as Rush's new deck hand. While Rush gained a helping hand on his charters, he also scored a new "Fishing Mate" who is always game to bend a rod. With a day off and a report of Tuna offshore, the two head out to see if they can beat the sharks and land a Key West sushi dinner.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through Georgia, where we stop in Helen, Alpharetta and Atlanta!!

programme.title: Destination Dive
programme.desc: In this episode, we will explore where the locals dive and experience the underwater gems where the natives love to hang out in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Dirty 30 is a groundbreaking docu-series filmed, edited, and directed by Eric Guarino. In this first episode, we follow Mike Iaconelli to the Bassmaster Elite Series on the iconic St. Johns River. As the camera rolls, we dive deep into the fishing world, shedding light on the industry and exploring the untold stories from Ike’s incredible 30-year career on the road.From behind-the-scenes moments to raw, unfiltered insights, this episode peels back the curtain on what it really takes to thrive in professional fishing. Get ready for some dirt, real talk, BIG FISH, and an up-close look at one of the sport’s most legendary figures.Folks at home,Celebrating 30 years in professional bass fishing is an incredible journey, and it wouldn’t be possible without you, the fans. Bass fishing professionally is really all about the fans, and I just want to say how much I appreciate every single one of you. I hope you enjoy the show!NEVER GIVE UP!!! — Ike

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.desc: What is Southern Culture on the Fly? Jay links up with the founders of this grassroots angling staple - SCOF Magazine.

programme.title: Fishing With Jay
programme.desc: Watch along as Jay learns to clean fish from ‪@reedthefishmonger‬. Watch the full video and learn to clean any fish.

programme.title: The Green Way Outdoors
programme.desc: Kyle Green heads to Yankton, South Dakota to learn about the history of the Missouri river and the people who count on the river for sustenance. The invasive carp are set to destroy this rich ecosystem and Kyle aims to stop this fish with his best weapon, a great recipe.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: Danny tries his hand at being a guide on the Manistee River with Koz. Then later Danny tries his fly fishing skills on the Crystal River to see if he can land a monster salmon on the fly.

programme.title: Stomping Grounds
programme.desc: Host Ryan McVinney takes Boat Trader fans on an indepth exploration of Florida flats fishing deep in the backcountry of Islamorada. Featuring Captain Eric Lund, a Wall Street Broker turned backcountry fishing guide, this episode reveals the key design features of the world’s best flats skiffs and how they are built for targeting some of the most exciting sportfish species on the planet. Also, covered are bay boats and their versatility for families exploring Florida’s coastal waterways, along with a detailed study of fish species and wildlife in the region. Some of the area’s most beautiful and secret locales show why Islamorada has earned the nickname of the Sportfish Capital of The World.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: New. York. City. That’s where our host Josh Rosen kicks off his journey in Episode 4—and where he lived for 16 years and started up the surf-centric apparel brand, Saturdays NYC. Back in his old stomping grounds, Josh first meets up with the award-winning chef and Mumbai native, Chintan Pandya, currently blowing up the New York food scene with his unapologetic and authentic Indian cuisine (pro tip: try the goat brains). Next, Josh travels through the boroughs, heads upstate, and along the coast to source local ingredients—from sake brewers and pig farmers to catching fresh lobster just 100 miles from Wall Street. As always the adventure will end with a feast, right back in Chintan’s kitchen.

programme.title: Duck Camp Dinners
programme.desc: The Duck Camp Dinners crew leaves the bayous and heads down river to Venice, Louisiana where they prepare for their first duck hunt in the delta.

programme.title: Goin' Coastal
programme.desc: Capt Josh and Johnny from Johnny Jigs head out with gorgeous weather on their side to hit some reefs and put the jigs to work!

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: From time to time you have moments that will change the way think about something. That is what happened for us while hunting the Scimitar Oryx with Republic Outdoors. Hunting is more than harvesting animals, it’s conservation, and in this story, we learn how a species nearly extinct gets another chance to live.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: We are blessed today to hunt with Cole Dutton for the Inaugural Pierce Dutton Memorial Hunt. We are honored to spend a weekend with Cole and his family at the G2 Ranch. Disabled Outdoorsman has played a huge part in getting those less fortunate outdoors. We are truly blessed to be able to follow along and capture these great moments.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: John Sewell has played a huge part in the development of feeding Fortified Cottonseed 365 days a year. Laramie Barrett of Fortified Cottonseed joins John for a great weekend of hunting at his ranch in Uvalde, Texas. This is a great time for Laramie to get away from the office and see the first hand of how their product is performing.

programme.title: Storytellers
programme.desc: This week we are rolling along side the crew from Double T Outfitters. Management plays a huge role in every outfitters success every year. Bret and his team have a strong management plan in place and these guys had a blast with a group of out of state hunters.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: In Episode 2: New Orleans, Josh links up with Mason Hereford (owner of award-winning sandwich shop Turkey and the Wolf) and then hits the road for some epic hog hunting, swamp fishing, crawfish and oyster harvesting, and exploring Louisiana’s only water buffalo dairy farm. It all culminates in one incredible feast featuring unique regional dishes prepared by Mason with the help of some local friends.

programme.title: Dirt
programme.desc: In Episode 3, Josh starts off in the Twin Cities where he meets up with Yia Vang, an award-winning Hmong chef and restaurant owner, bringing his family’s traditions and flavors to the American Midwest. As Josh heads up north to Duluth and the boundary waters, he’ll meet plenty of farmers and foragers—harvesting mushrooms, wild rice, and catching a few fish (and waves) along the way. It all wraps up with an epic feast hosted by Yia back in the cities.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: Ryan Miller targets exotic fish in Lake Ida with local guide Kevin Cannon in Episode 2 of FinQuest. Catching peacock bass and clown knife fish, Ryan also enjoys family fun with a skimboarding session in Jupiter, Florida.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 3 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller joins Captain Alex from Supremacy Fishing Charters for an offshore adventure targeting big fish off shore. Starting at the Palm Beach Inlet, the team uses planar fishing techniques to hook wahoo and other catches like kingfish and amberjack. Along the way, firefighter Johnny Bennett shares his journey from fishing to starting a popular fish dip business. The day wraps up with thrilling doubleheader catches and a conservation message, showcasing the importance of sustainable fishing practices.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 4 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller explores Jupiter’s Inner Coastal Waterway, blending fishing, paddleboarding, and community engagement. With the help of Matthew from Jupiter Live Bait, Ryan showcases bait preparation techniques before catching snook in the vibrant ICW. He highlights Jupiter's community spirit by joining a local clean-up initiative with Jeremy from Blue Line Paddleboards. The episode features paddleboarding adventures with Ryan’s family, connecting with nature and marine life, and ends with a conservation message about preserving Jupiter’s pristine environment.

programme.title: FinQuest
programme.desc: In Episode 5 of FinQuest, Ryan Miller dives into the vibrant world of offshore fishing off the coast of Palm Beach County. Joined by Cabo Mike, they showcase expert bait techniques and strategies, reeling in a variety of catches, including bonita and a stunning mahi mahi. The duo shares insights into their fishing setup, explains the use of daisy chains, and celebrates their exciting day at sea. With breathtaking views of the ocean and a colorful array of fish, Ryan’s passion for saltwater fishing shines through. The episode wraps up with a reflection on the beauty and bounty of Palm Beach County waters.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.desc: Day 1 of the Thousand Islands Open on Lake Ontario and the St,. Lawrence River.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.desc: Final Day of the Thousand Islands Open on Lake Ontario and the St,. Lawrence River.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: This week, JP is joined by friend & guide Rob Jackson on the famed St. Lawrence River System.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: Week 1 of the Tropic Star Inshore Seminars features guests targeting a plethora of species in the life rich waters surrounding the lodge.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team take a look into enhanced storage and utility options from Boat Outfitters like cooler slides, tackle storage and CoolerWebs . They also tackle applying Tuff-coat paint to the Aquasport project and showcase how easy it is to apply.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY, where they are tackling a new paint Job using Interlux’s paint specifically designed for aluminum hulls. John and the crew take us step by step on what takes to paint on aluminum hulls as well as some other tips from guest hosts.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: The team breaks down how, when, and where to create mock scrapes to attract and inventory mature bucks on your hunting property. programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: Whether you're hunting 10 acres or 1,000, how you handle boundaries, buck movement, and communication with neighboring hunters can make or break your season. programme.desc: A CIA agent confronts the legacy of his dead enemy when his bunker HQ is attacked a second time.

programme.desc: Morgan Freeman is a controversial educator battling for his high school.

programme.desc: A lonely woman's discovery of a man's letter in a bottle leads to love.

programme.desc: Two complete misfits aspire to spy for the CIA.

programme.title: Monkey Trouble
programme.desc: Eva's (Thora Birch) mom (Mimi Rodgers) is obsessively neat; her dad's (Christopher McDonald) allergic to fur. But when a thieving organ grinder's (Harvey Keitel) monkey escapes, Eva bonds with a new friend. As much as she tries, Eva can't housebreak her new pet ... or break him of his training to steal. And Eva's getting the blame in this heartwarming family comedy.

programme.desc: During a summer in Nantucket, a recent high school grad with dreams of being a cartoonist helps a young singer save her family home from developers.

programme.desc: The battle between the good and the bad is bound to get ugly.

programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh leads an all-star cast in an adaptation of Shakespeare's great tragedy - the story of Hamlet.

programme.title: Suspect
programme.desc: Kathleen is an overworked public defender who needs a vacation. Instead, she is given another case with no ordinary crime and no ordinary criminal.

programme.title: Fresh Horses
programme.desc: Jewel married a gun-totin' good ol' boy Green, with whom she has ostensibly never had sex. But when she meets rich kid Matt, it's love at first sight.

programme.title: Swept From the Sea
programme.desc: Amy, a servant girl, and Yanko, the sole survivor of a capsized ship bound for America, begin a fiery affair at the end of the nineteenth century.

programme.title: Immediate Family
programme.desc: An upscale couple unable to conceive arrange a brokered adoption with a pregnant woman who doesn’t hold up her end of the deal to give up the baby.

programme.title: Heartsounds
programme.desc: A near-fatal heart attack sends a New York urologist and his writer wife into a battle against a medical institution unable or unwilling to help him.

programme.title: Wings of Courage
programme.desc: The film tells the dramatic story of three legendary French aviators and the first historic airmail flights in the Andes. It combines a tale of high adventure and excitement with cutting-edge technology, and is the fulfillment of one of Annaud's long-held dreams.

programme.title: Runaway
programme.desc: A futuristic cop who works on broken robots discovers a plan to program them with artificial intelligence for murder, with his own son on the list.

programme.title: Mary Reilly
programme.desc: An innocent domestic worker comes to realize her employer and benefactor, Dr. Jekyll, is hiding a horrifying secret involving his curious assistant.

programme.title: Places in the Heart
programme.desc: This stirring drama follows a widow as she struggles to raise her two children and save her Texas farm during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Fire on the Mountain
programme.desc: A stubborn rancher in his twilight years takes on the U.S. government when the Air Force tries to expropriate his New Mexico land for a missile range.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Dreaming of being a famous R&B guitarist, a young virtuoso seeks out a legendary musician and must convince him to teach him the ways of the blues.

programme.title: Center Stage
programme.desc: The classic film about the intense training required by a group of ballet students giving their personal best to place in a renowned ballet company.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: What begins as a casual chat turns into something more complex, as a romance blooms between a high school junior and a senior on his way to college.

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: A rich woman and a communist sailor are stranded on a deserted Mediterranean island where, after some fights, they unexpectedly fall for each other.

programme.title: Switching Channels
programme.desc: A news anchor and journalist wants to escape the humiliation of the newsroom, but her conniving ex-husband won't let her leave so easily.

programme.title: Crazy in Alabama
programme.desc: Lucille, is an eccentric who goes to Hollywood to pursue her dreams. In tow is her nephew, Peejoe, an Alabama boy who's about to get a fast education.

programme.title: Talhotblond
programme.desc: Thomas meets a beautiful teenager online, with whom he engages in a nearly two-year romance over the Internet until she learns the truth about him, which leads Thomas to exact the ultimate revenge.

programme.title: Vice Versa
programme.desc: An ill-gotten mystical skull has a body-and-mind-switching effect on a high-powered department store exec and his neglected 11-year-old son.

programme.title: Relative Chaos
programme.desc: Dil and his girlfriend, Katherine, attempt to end his 25-year losing streak in the annual Gilbert Cup, a fiercely competitive family tradition.

programme.title: North
programme.desc: After a judge allows him to sever ties to his work-obsessed parents, a boy embarks on an international quest for the quintessential set of parents.

programme.title: Immediate Family
programme.desc: An upscale couple unable to conceive arrange a brokered adoption with a pregnant woman who doesn’t hold up her end of the deal to give up the baby.

programme.title: Breakable You
programme.desc: The film follows the Wellers, a dynamic New York City family, as they come to terms with changes in their personal lives and each other.

programme.title: Sister Mary Explains It All
programme.desc: A confrontation between three former students and a nun forever changes their lives as the students turn the dogmatic nun's teachings on their head.

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: The film version of the Broadway smash rock opera about a chosen family of New York City starving artists dealing with poverty, AIDS, and addiction.

programme.title: The Three Stooges in Orbit
programme.desc: When a pair of Martians steal a powerful submarine-tank-rocket military weapon from an inventor, the Three Stooges step in to try to save the day.

programme.title: The Whole Town's Talking
programme.desc: Clerk Arthur Jones (Edward G. Robinson) lives a dull life until someone realizes that he looks like gangster "Killer" Mannion (also Robinson). After Jones is brought in by the police and his identity is verified, he is given a note to assuage any other suspicious policeman. Jones is hired by a newspaper to write about Mannion and starts dating Wilhelmina Clark (Jean Arthur). However, when Jones returns home one night, Mannion is waiting and demands the note so that he can roam freely.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: A malfunction inadvertently sends American planes armed with nuclear warheads to Russia in a blunder of potentially apocalyptic proportions.

programme.title: Doctor Faustus
programme.desc: Frustrated with the limits of his knowledge, Dr. Faustus calls upon Lucifer and offers his soul in return for 24 years of hedonism and invincibility.

programme.title: Rusty Leads the Way
programme.desc: With the help of his canine buddy, Rusty, a kind, young kid performs good deeds for people and befriends a blind girl in the process.

programme.title: Diamond Head
programme.desc: A wealthy Hawaiian pineapple plantation owner and bigoted bully with political ambitions flatly refuses to allow his young sister to marry a native.

programme.title: Tell It to the Judge
programme.desc: Marsha Meredith (Rosalind Russell) has just been offered a position as a federal judge. Much to her dismay, her nomination is challenged on the grounds that her divorce renders her unsuitable for the courtroom. Desperate to win the position, Marsha arranges a fake marriage to Alexander (Gig Young), even though she still has feelings for Peter (Robert Cummings), her ex-husband. Marsha and Alexander -- and Marsha and Peter -- soon find themselves in a series of compromising situations.

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: Passport to Suez
programme.desc: Master sleuth Lone Wolf (Warren William) outwits Nazi spies for canal plans in Egypt.

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: When a kerfuffle over fine wine exports upends their tiny nation's economy, the prime minister and grand duchess of Fenwick declare war on the U.S.

programme.title: The Last Angry Man
programme.desc: A principled elderly doctor in Brooklyn remains suspicious when his would-be journalist nephew persuades him to let his life story be told on TV.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: A nouveau-riche L.A. couple decide to call it quits after 17 years of marriage, but alimony woes send the bachelor in search of a husband for his ex.

programme.title: Our Man in Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited as a spy by the British secret service. Despite his phony reports and lies, he quickly gains importance.

programme.title: The Undercover Man
programme.desc: Determined Treasury Department investigator Frank Warren (Glenn Ford) goes after a ruthless mobster known as The Big Fellow. When a key informant is murdered, Warren pursues the gangster on charges of tax evasion. But, with a slick mob lawyer hampering him at every turn, and threats being lobbed toward Warren's wife (Nina Foch), the lawman's chances of achieving a conviction are slim to none. His only hope is that one syndicate bookkeeper will have the courage to turn state's evidence.

programme.title: Gidget Grows Up
programme.desc: When her boyfriend leaves for the Air Force without calling, Gidget heads to New York in the name of world peace and joins the U.N. as a tour guide.

programme.title: 711 Ocean Drive
programme.desc: A phone company repairman bites off more than he can chew when he agrees to create a system that broadcasts race track results for a crime boss.

programme.title: Miss Grant Takes Richmond
programme.desc: A bookie operating behind a real estate front gets pulled into the business for real when he hires a daffy secretary who thinks the office is legit.

programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: A rich merchant's beautiful daughter and her volatile older sister are courted by rival suitors in this rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: A stranded group of six Allied soldiers trek across the desert, making their way to an abandoned fort, but are soon faced with a German battalion.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: The long-standing bond between two small-time smugglers sailing around the Caribbean is threatened when a gorgeous siren seeks passage on their boat.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Jim Leonard, a penniless aviator and airplane mechanic, falls in love with the wealthy Carol Owen while giving her flying lessons.

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: A mute boy who spends his days roaming the English countryside starts coming out of his shell when he befriends a wild pony and a retired colonel.

programme.title: What a Woman!
programme.desc: An author (Willard Parker) and a literary agent (Rosalind Russell) become involved after selling film rights to his racy book.

programme.title: Good Neighbor Sam
programme.desc: A happily married advertising agent helps out his single neighbor by posing as her husband so she can inherit a 15 million dollar fortune.

programme.title: Up the MacGregors
programme.desc: Gregor MacGregor (David Bailey) is celebrating his upcoming marriage to Rosita Carson (Agata Flori) when bandits, led by the evil Maldonado (Leo Anchóriz), steal the family fortune. Determined to get their money back, Gregor and his six brothers go after the robbers. They run across a dentist and his beautiful daughter, who help them find the gang's hideout and retrieve their cash -- but then Maldonado takes Rosita hostage in retaliation. When Gregor comes to save her, he is also captured.

programme.title: The Last Rebel
programme.desc: Two Confederates (Joe Namath, Jack Elam) save a man's (Woody Strode) life and cause trouble in 1865 Missouri.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Searching for work, cowboy Jubal Troop (Glenn Ford) arrives in a small town, where he badly injures his hand. Fortunately, a local rancher, Shep Horgan (Ernest Borgnine), is willing to employ Troop despite the injury. Horgan and Troop work together amicably, but Horgan's two-timing wife (Valerie French) threatens to create discord when she becomes interested in Troop, although he really loves another woman. A jealous cowhand (Rod Steiger) complicates matters by spreading lies.

programme.title: Pecos River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his singing sidekick (Smiley Burnette) catch mail robbers.

programme.title: Kazan
programme.desc: A Canadian government wildlife expert (Stephan Dunne) tames a white dog trained to fight by brutal masters.

programme.title: Lust for Gold
programme.desc: During the 1870s, the ruthless Jacob Walz (Glenn Ford) becomes very wealthy after locating a legendary Arizona gold mine and securing sole ownership by murdering his partner. Walz then travels to Phoenix, where he catches the attention of a beautiful and crafty woman named Julia Thomas (Ida Lupino), who has learned of his exploits. Eventually, Walz falls in love with Julia, unaware that she's already married to Pete (Gig Young), who is eyeing his fortune.

programme.title: The Domino Kid
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran (Rory Calhoun) hunts to kill the five outlaws who ran off his cattle and shot his father.

programme.title: Return to Warbow
programme.desc: Three escaped convicts return to collect the money that the brother of one of them has already spent.

programme.title: Scalplock
programme.desc: A frontier gambler (Dale Robertson) wins a railroad in a card game and has to keep it going as people try to take it away from him.

programme.title: The Untamed Breed
programme.desc: Texas ranchers resist an out-of-towner (Sonny Tufts) who has a Brahman bull to breed.

programme.title: The Texan Meets Calamity Jane
programme.desc: Calamity Jane's rightful ownership of a gambling hall is challenged but a Texas lawyer puts up a sensational legal battle to help her stay in charge.

programme.title: California Conquest
programme.desc: A Spanish swashbuckler (Cornel Wilde) and a gunsmith's daughter (Teresa Wright) oppose a Russian plot to annex California.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: After fleeing a sheriff's escort to jail, an outlaw thief crosses paths with a mysterious stranger and a greedy rancher en route to his stash of gold.

programme.title: The Palomino
programme.desc: Steve Norris (Jerome Courtland), the heir to a meat-packing fortune, has a yearning to set out and forge a path of his own. His rebellious streak leads him to the broken down horse-breeding farm of the bewitching beauty Maria Guevara (Beverly Tyler). Enchanted by this determined young woman, Norris decides to assist her in saving her business. But this enrages duplicitous rival breeder Ben Lane (Roy Roberts), who steals away Guevara's prize palomino in an attempt to cripple her operation.

programme.title: Reprisal!
programme.desc: Frank Madden (Guy Madison), who is part Native American but passes as white, purchases a ranch in the small town of Kendall, Okla. When Frank moves in, he finds that the bigoted townspeople have recently let three brothers, who are also his neighbors, get away with the lynching murder of innocent Native Americans. As tensions between the townspeople and local Native Americans rise, Hank becomes torn between fighting against injustice and keeping his true identity a secret.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: A bounty hunter escorts a killer to prison but allows his outlaw brother to catch up with them to have a showdown over a previous shocking murder.

programme.title: Bonanza Town
programme.desc: A Western that’s chock-full of action and fights as a cowboy tries to collar a group of outlaws while a crooked judge does all he can to stop him.

programme.title: North From the Lone Star
programme.desc: Wild Bill Hickok (Bill Elliott) puts on a badge to clean up a town.

programme.title: The Great Sioux Massacre
programme.desc: The story of Gen. Custer (Philip Carey) and the Little Bighorn is seen through the eyes of two of his subordinates (Joseph Cotten, Darren McGavin).

programme.title: Up the MacGregors
programme.desc: Gregor MacGregor (David Bailey) is celebrating his upcoming marriage to Rosita Carson (Agata Flori) when bandits, led by the evil Maldonado (Leo Anchóriz), steal the family fortune. Determined to get their money back, Gregor and his six brothers go after the robbers. They run across a dentist and his beautiful daughter, who help them find the gang's hideout and retrieve their cash -- but then Maldonado takes Rosita hostage in retaliation. When Gregor comes to save her, he is also captured.

programme.title: Phantom Stagecoach
programme.desc: A dispute between stage lines ends with a steel-armored stagecoach.

programme.title: Jack McCall, Desperado
programme.desc: A lone gunslinger, Jack McCall (George Montgomery), bursts into a saloon and shoots dead the legendary Wild Bill Hickok (Douglas Kennedy). Arrested and put on trial, McCall recounts a twisted tale that paints Hickok as anything but heroic, explaining how Hickok and McCall's cousin Bat (James Seay) took over McCall's family's plantation, killed his parents and even framed him for crimes he didn't commit. McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

programme.title: Montana Territory
programme.desc: A cowgirl vigilante (Wanda Hendrix) proves to a deputy (Lon McCallister) that the sheriff (Preston Foster) is an outlaw.

programme.title: Land Raiders
programme.desc: An Arizona land-grabber (Telly Savalas) and his brother (George Maharis) renew their feud amid Army troops and Apaches.

programme.title: The Pathfinder
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name, a scout is sent by the British to infiltrate a French stronghold near the Great Lakes in the 1750s.

programme.title: Banjo Hackett
programme.desc: Banjo Hackett, a free-spirited horse trader, accompanied by his orphaned nephew, travels the American West searching for a rare Arabian mare.

programme.title: The Texas Rangers
programme.desc: The Civil War has ended, the Union Army has pulled out, and now the Texas Rangers are needed once again to protect their state from harm. The newly reformed Rangers decide to take a chance by hiring a notorious outlaw Johnny Carver (George Montgomery). They offer the desperado amnesty for his previous crimes if he'll put his famous trigger finger to work for Texas. Carver agrees, but his new job won't be easy, as his old rival, the Sundance Kid (Ian MacDonald), is out for vengeance.

programme.title: The Outlaw Stallion
programme.desc: A boy and his mother are kidnapped by outlaws after the boy's stallion kills the outlaw leader's mount.

programme.title: Kung Fu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Revisit the golden age of kung fu stuntmen and action directors in Hong Kong during the 1960s-'80s.

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Top thieves plan a high-stakes heist, pursued by a legendary French detective across Europe.

programme.title: Little Big Soldier
programme.desc: An old soldier kidnaps a young enemy general and takes him on a long journey to collect the reward.

programme.title: Hansan: Rising Dragon
programme.desc: In 1592, Admiral Yi Sun-sin uses the Turtle Ship to battle Japanese forces off Hansan Island. Epic naval clash ensues

programme.title: Striking Rescue
programme.desc: They killed his wife. They killed his daughter. Now, Muay Thai expert Bai An (Tony Jaa) is coming for them.

programme.title: Mojin: The Lost Legend
programme.desc: The film adaptation of the bestselling novels about three grave robbers up against rivals and the law until they’re tempted to do one more huge job.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon and the Lost Talisman
programme.desc: After a mysterious client arrives at his door, a fake exorcist experiences disturbing events that challenge his skepticism in the supernatural.

programme.title: They Won't Believe Me
programme.desc: A faithless husband is charged with a murder he didn't commit.

programme.desc: A swinging bachelor finds love when he meets a girl immune to his line.

programme.desc: A bride attempts to turn her six brothers-in-law into gentlemen.

programme.desc: A beautiful woman takes over a turn-of-the-century baseball team.

programme.desc: Two aging sisters are connected by mutual dependency, jealousy and hatred.

programme.desc: When suitcases are mixed up, a chase across San Francisco follows.

programme.desc: As he prepares for the Las Vegas Grand Prix, Lucky tries to secure funds for a new engine while winning the affections of a hotel swim instructor.

programme.title: Sergeant York
programme.desc: Recruited to fight in World War I, a Tennessee farmer with deep pacifist beliefs is driven to take up arms when his unit is overwhelmed by Germans.

programme.desc: A biography of a man who is unjustly convicted of murder, gets locked up in French Guiana, and devotes his life to escaping from prison.

programme.desc: An 1830s loner leaves civilization and learns how to be a mountain man.

programme.desc: The Bowery Boys go undercover to catch some unruly gangsters.

programme.desc: After one of the Bowery Boys inherits an estate on Long Island, the crew face a German gang of smugglers.

programme.title: Wild Rovers
programme.desc: Cowboy Ross Bodine decides to join his buddy in robbing a bank to finance a comfortable retirement.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette (1938)
programme.desc: Lavish biography of the French queen who "let them eat cake."

programme.title: Time After Time
programme.desc: When Jack the Ripper steals his time machine, H.G. Wells tracks him down.

programme.title: The Super Cops
programme.desc: Two New York cops are sent to a crime-ridden section of Brooklyn, where they develop their own bizarre and amusingly extreme methods of fighting.

programme.title: The Outfit
programme.desc: After unknowingly robbing a syndicate bank, an ex-con demands $250,000 from the mob to avenge his brother's death in a dangerous quest for justice.

programme.title: The Tunnel of Love
programme.desc: A married couple endures endless red tape when they try to adopt a child.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Robin Hood
programme.desc: In this swashbuckling classic, the legendary hero fights to rid England of the tyranny of Prince John and win the love of the beautiful Maid Marian.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After an elusive terrorist with a personal vendetta against Hannah resurfaces, she and her family are placed in protective custody while the team searches for the suspect.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a reshuffling of assignments, Pride returns to the New Orleans office during the investigation of a missing petty officer.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the murder of Patton's friend, a former Navy SEAL gunned down in a drive-by shooting while Patton watched.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A Navy lieutenant from a well-connected and affluent family has a fatal fall down a flight of stairs at a charity gala; the team investigates whether his death was an accident or foul play.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The suspicious death of popular young GP Dr Alan Delaney brings Barnaby and Jones to Midsomer Market to investigate. The detectives are baffled as to a motive for murder - until they consider that the newly engaged Dr James Kirkwood may have been the intended victim. Before long, Barnaby and Jones are heading to Wales - former home to Delyth Mostyn, James's fiancee, to delve deeper into the mystery. There are certainly possible suspects in the murder and attempt on Kirkwood, from Delyth's children, who oppose the engagement, Delyth's husband, and more, as the detectives investigate things, in hopes of uncovering the truth before a major walk is to take place on Mount Snowdon.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: In the build-up to Luxton Deeping's annual photographic exhibition, a battle rages between the traditional and digital photographers of the pretty village. The dispute seems harmless enough - until Lionel Bell is found murdered in a nearby woodland, strangled with the cord of his light meter. Barnaby soon gets to work tracking down the killer, but it seems someone is trying to implicate the detective in the murder. And once he is replaced on the case, finding the culprit seems less likely than ever, as his replacement is more concerned of an upcoming wedding than the investigation. Barnaby is forced to work off the case to uncover who is framing him, and who wants dead other photographers in the village.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A killer uses an unusual, high-tech weapon to murder a genius billionaire.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a skydiver with more than 100 children, all of them suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team steps in when multiple women are targeted during a murder spree at a Miami sorority.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The investigation into the murder of a neighborhood do-gooder reveals he was planning on exposing something big.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When the Miami Taunter strikes again, Horatio meets with the matriarch of the suspected killer's family.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Calliegh uncovers a personal connection to a case involving the near-death of a popular tennis coach.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio uncovers a scandal that pits him against a former adversary; Calleigh faces a life-altering decision.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When an enemy of the CSIs is killed, Horatio looks to his team for a suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team searches for evidence and survivors after a jet crashes into the Everglades, trying to recreate what transpired on the fatal flight.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio sets out on a personal mission to find his mentor's killer, and Megan worries that he has become too emotionally involved in the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and Megan examine the remains of a human torso found in a tiger shark's stomach. Wanda De Jesus guest stars.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A wealthy family uses their power and influence to distance themselves from a rape and murder investigation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A priest is shot to death in his church rectory; Horatio and Delko examine the charred remain of a pregnant woman.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team investigate the murder of a 5-year-old girl in a restaurant washroom.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Poisoning is suspected as the team probes the murder of a male stripper found dead in the wake of a female sex party; a deep sea diver is fatally stabbed while underwater.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Evidence on a lost, blood-soaked toddler leads the CSI team to her home where each family member's spilled blood tells a tale of horror. Wanda De Jesus guest stars.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team tries to get inside the mind of a sniper after three people are shot and killed in downtown Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a professor, who was found hanging from a tree after being tortured.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team investigate after the corpse of an unidentified girl is found near an extremely strict rehabilitation camp.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio investigates the stabbing death of a prostitute who is found stuffed under a bed in a hotel room.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver and the team are on a plane that's in the air when the pilot has a heart attack.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: As MacGyver works quickly to rescue survivors from a collapsed building in Germany, he discovers a new safety threat -- an undetonated bomb from World War II is hidden beneath the rubble.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: In an attempt to find the main players in the Codex and cut off their match-fixing funding, Desi goes under cover to infiltrate a soccer team and find the corrupt player working with the shadow organization.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Russ' first love, Emilia, is kidnapped by the same rebels he fought during his private military contract days, he takes the Phoenix team to a small, impoverished town to rescue her and rid the town of the rebels for good.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: A double date descends into chaos when Mac and Desi witness a murder in the back of the restaurant; as they work to find the killer, Riley tries to keep the secret about her and her friends' "day jobs' from her new boyfriend.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After Oversight is almost killed in a bombing, he recruits Mac to help him find the suspected bomber; Mac meets his Aunt Gwendolyn.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Los Angeles' power grid is taken hostage in a ransomware attack resulting in a citywide blackout; the team discovers the ransomware code used was written by Riley years ago.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Mac is put into a dream state to help him recall key evidence found in Nikola Tesla's secret lab that could stop Codex's deadly plot, he encounters Nikola Tesla, Alexander Graham Bell, Thomas Edison and his mother.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team investigates a series of murders with unidentifiable victims in Bakersfield, Calif.; agent Kate Callahan joins the team.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team members search for a vengeful suspect who was once abused; Garcia travels to Texas to confront the person she shot.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team goes to Colorado to investigate when a passenger jet crashes; the incident reminds Kate of a family tragedy.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A body is found covered in scratches, leading the BAU to believe that the person responsible has a chronic skin disorder.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A child reappears one year after he went missing -- but the team must work quickly when a trick-or-treater disappears under similar circumstances.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team has a difficult time finding a common denominator among several male victims in Montana; J.J. struggles with feelings about her sister's death.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team believes a suspect is taking on the persona of an Internet urban legend when people with substantial social media followings are found dead; Savannah and Morgan try to find time for each other.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: As the team investigates the disappearance of a prominent Boston attorney, secrets of the man's past are revealed.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU tracks a conflicted killer in Virginia who feels remorseful after committing crimes; Rossi receives a visitor.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When the BAU heads to Salt Lake City to look into a triple homicide, their investigation may lead to a fugitive.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An investigation of a car fire and a bludgeon murder lead Barnaby and Troy to investigate the members of a local reading club which has an agenda that goes beyond books.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates the murder of a boy during a traditional annual race at an exclusive private school but meets with resentment.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Plans by Barnaby to renew his wedding vows at the church of St Michael's in Badger's Drift, are quickly put on hold when the body of Richard Bayly, a local developer, is found decapitated in his own home. The detective is left mystified as to why anyone would kill a man who had only been given weeks to live, after being recently diagnosed with a brain tumour. As he and Troy attempt to find out, they soon encounter a hotbed of corruption and property feuding occurring within the village as the body count rises and the mystery deepens.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When Carla Constanza - the face of Brazil's leading cigarette brand for Monarch Tobacco - is found strangled in the infamous Strangler's Wood, Barnaby and Troy not only find themselves investigating her murder, but three identical unsolved murders of innocent girls from eight years before.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Cully's latest boyfriend, Nico, decides to shadow Troy in preparation for a TV role he recently got, but gets more hands-on experience than he expected when investigations into a slashed painting at a museum in Aspern Tallow, a 17th century portrait of Royalist Jonathan Lowrie, are overshadowed by the murder of his descendant, Marcus Lowrie. It isn't long before Barnaby and Troy, with Nico's assistance, find themselves dealing with mysterious, ghostly events, escaped criminals, and a museum trustee who has more to them than meets the eye.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Hector Bridges, a local magistrate, is infuriated when one of his geese is stolen, just as two bands of travellers arrive in Martyr Warren. Although Barnaby and Troy are called in to deal with the theft and later dissuade him from forcefully evicting the travellers from the village, they soon have a murder on their hands, when a short while later Bridges is killed with his own shotgun. It quickly transpires that many in the village had hated the magistrate, who lied, bullied, and committed many an injustice, leaving the detectives determined to find who among them had pulled the trigger after Bridges pushed them past their breaking point.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and new detective Charlie Nelson moves into Midsomer. He's thrown straight into an intriguing mystery in the village of Morton Shallows. A man is fatally stabbed with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a "haunted" manor house. Can Barnaby and Nelson find a more earthly motive behind the murder and trap the killer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A series of murders in Midsomer St Claire seem to be inspired by macabre images on a medieval fresco recently discovered in the church crypt. As the village prepares for storms and flooding it appears that someone is using ancient torture methods to punish modern-day "sinners". But who is responsible and why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When wealthy farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to restaurant Wyvern House and its tyrannical celebrity chef Ruth Cameron. Secrets from the past surface and the killer strikes again - but the poison spreads wider than its intended target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a body is discovered in a reservoir dropped out of a plane, Barnaby and Nelson find the world of stunt pilots and military heroes hides many dark secrets. Are campaigners against the local airfield behind Bernard King's murder or does it link back to a tragic story from World War Two?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives, the abrasive and astute Poulsen and the charming and cool Degn. They discover Eric Calder had more linking him to Copenhagen than just his famous Golden Clusters.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The ghost village of Little Auburn has been abandoned since the war. When a young man is found murdered during its grand reopening, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Bleakridge Watch patrols the streets of their remote village, exposing anyone who steps outside the law. When one of their members dies, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter uncover just how far some people will go for power...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Tensions run high in Lower Pampling as a new type of cricket threatens a century of tradition. When a star cricketer dies during a tournament, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter's investigation draws them into a dangerous game with a surprise visitor from Barnaby's past...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When DCI Barnaby and DS Winter discover a dead body covered in live rabbits it reveals a sinister side to the local pet show. Is this a rivalry taken too far or is the killer driven by something darker?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young girl slips away from a Jane Austen weekend dressed in period attire, and is found stabbed in the woods, DCI Barnaby and DS Winter need to look back in time to find the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As the annual Thassingham Classical Music Festival draws in big audiences, several musicians anxiously compete for the coveted Falconer Bursary Award. When the winner is brutally murdered and a priceless violin stolen, Barnaby and Winter's investigations lead them deep into a world haunted by a potentially deadly curse.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths amongst an aristocratic family. In the midst of a Civil War re-enactment the family relive their own historic battles with their hostile neighbours. But what is the truth about the DeQuettevilles - and the ghostly rider?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a barrister is killed in Midsomer, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. Grady has just returned to the village where he committed the murder years ago amid much anger from locals. But Grady has a solid alibi. Barnaby suspects he is working with an accomplice - until Grady himself is targeted in an arson attack.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The murder of a journalist has chilling echoes of a 1960s horror film starring Midsomer's own Stella Harris. When Stella's more famous sister returns after a 40-year family rift, the killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot. Is life - and death - imitating art?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, amateur astronomer Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite. Barnaby and Jones soon discover intrigue, sexual tension and academic rivalry are rife among the star-seeking community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Harriet Farmer wakes up after being in a coma since the night she tried to elope. Soon afterwards, a killer strikes members of a chess club. Could the attack which left Harriet for dead a year ago be linked to moves on a chess board? And where is her boyfriend Finn?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A woman is crushed to death with a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue. Secret and controversial plans to modernise the dairy are revealed while rumours about private lives of the parents cause a row at the prestigious local prep school. As other people linked to the dairy meet agonising deaths, long-held secrets start to emerge...

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Midsomer is buzzing with excitement at the arrival of the annual ‘Paramount Dance Extravaganza’. But behind the sequins and smiles are deep running feuds and passions.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Prolific real estate agent Alexander Beauvoisin is murdered in front of a crowd at the unveiling of a new dolls house collection at Midsomer Museum of the family.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Deddington’s thriving bee Empire has put Granville Norton on the map, but what lengths will they go to to ensure they’re never dethroned…

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The battle between Shelby Stanga and Richard comes to a head; Buck and Swilley's boat goes boom; a greenhorn at Big Gun shows his dark side; Joe and Coatsy bury the hatchet.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe's two-yarder plan goes further off track when one crew member defects to the other team; Big Gun races their tightest deadline yet; Joe and the new guy get into it; an accident could take S&S out of the Log-Off for good.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: At Rygaard, a crew shakeup leaves everyone scrambling; S&S suffers a blow; Buck and Swilley get unexpected help from James; Papac takes to the open seas for a fishing trip; Big Gun brings in a new yarder operator.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Jimmy Smith braves the depths of the Suwannee River; Shelby takes on a log that flipped his winch last season; the boys of Siderius play fast and loose; Rygaard pushes their yarder to the brink of disaster.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe's two yarder sides are reunited; the alliance between team Buck and James Smith comes to a bitter end; Joe's hard-yarding style sends the rigging crew running for cover; two new teams of ox loggers enter the race.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby finds something that could lead to the biggest payday ever; Craig and Wayne plot a prank to teach Dave a lesson; personality differences between the ox loggers cause walk-offs on both sides; James returns to S&S.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby chases buried gold in Lake Ponchartrain; a surprising end to the log-off forces sudden death in Florida; a greenhorn's mistake could cost Big Gun's season's profits; the ox loggers and cowboys of Siderius fight to finish their seasons strong.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Pushing hard pushes Joe to his breaking point; Dave wears out his welcome at Rygaard; the teams fight to win the final round of the log-off in the Suwannee; bad blood between Jimmy and James comes to a head.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Papac battles to bring the yarder operator back from the brink; Craig forces Gabe to choose between himself and Dave; Levi drops a bomb; the Great Suwannee River Log-Off comes to a close.

programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.desc: A compilation of the best scenes from all 11 seasons of A&E's hit series Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a "color run" to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off. Meanwhile, when Jep, Martin, and Godwin play a practical joke on Uncle Si.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn the ins and outs of riding, roping and clowning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure in his life, so he hires him to take his place at Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product and has unorthodox sales strategies. Back in Monroe, Jep and Si have to track down an important item of Willie's that they accidentally shipped out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones and other devices so he initiates a "No-Tech Week," but when he has to participate too it ends up being harder than he thought.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si, upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise, invests in John Luke's Sno­Cone stand.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Roadkill

programme.desc: David, Mike and Steve throw cars off a cliff at Glacier View in Alaska.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The Draguar makes an epic return all the way to racing at NHRA Nationals.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The Vanishing Paint Challenger is back with an upgraded suspension and it's ready to dominate the autocross; David Freiburger and Steve Dulcich enter Tire Rack SCCA Solo Nationals in Lincoln, Neb., a mere 1,700 miles away.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: It's a Roadkill challenge like no other; David Freiburger and Mike Finnegan are joined by Motor Trend hosts for an all-out war on tires.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike salvage a Road Runner that had an encounter with a pole.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike work on improving their Mazdarati mini-truck.

programme.title: Roadkill

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike merge the front halves of two four-wheel-drive vehicles.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike attempt to fill the Mazdarati void with their new Econorado.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike consider themselves masters of burnout-ology; yet they have never actually entered a burnout competition until now; they take a rusted-out '76 Camaro and set out across Texas to show how to scientifically get the best burnouts.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike take a 1964 Ford Galaxie 500 XL that absolutely needed to be rescued; after a few miles, the car begins to smoke worse than any car in the history of Roadkill.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: David and Mike find beaters under $3K; it's a four-vehicle shootout with Chevy vs. Ford, truck vs. car, and old vs. newer; Freiburger chose a 2006 Crown Vic and a 1999 Chevy S-10; Finnegan went vintage with a 1972 Ford Maverick and a 1976 Chevy LUV.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike and David drive a new car every day as they trade their way through the 25th Hot Rod Power Tour; each day, they'll swap their junk for someone else's and try to make it to the next stop on the tour.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Steve finds a '71 Pontiac T-37 at a junkyard in Idaho; Mike and David take their time reviving a motor that's been sitting for 38 years.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike Finnegan and Tony Angelo buy a mid-1970s Chevy LUV mini-truck and hit the road, enduring electrical problems, torrential downpours, water in the engine, and floods.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The show goes back to its roots, but with a bigger map and a newer Dart.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Dodge project cars race at the Roadkill Nights event in Pontiac, Michigan.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike, Tony and the '55 Chevy Bel Air compete in a brutal five-day test.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys want to revive the long-neglected '71 240Z and drive it to SEMA.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike and Tony divert from a road trip to accept a drag racing challenge.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Mike and David buy each other their worst automotive nightmares and put them to the test against Steve in a showdown; Finnegan rides high, Freiburger works through some "cosmetic" damage and Dulcich rampages through fire.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The T-Bizzle is an '86 Thunderbird powered by a 302 V8, topped with a 6-71 blower and welded gears; Freiburger and Finnegan take it across the frozen tundra of the northern U.S., on a classic road trip with plenty of fail.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan take a look at Roadkill's Top Project Cars.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan clean out wheels that have been stashed in the garage for far too long by slapping them on a neglected '66 Dodge D100 Utiline truck; they hit the road on a quest to find the perfect 440 for it.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys scrounge their parts piles and come up with impressive results.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich settle who has the better cheap 4x4.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys have a build off and race like no other; Tony transforms a shell of an '85 Monte Carlo into a beast, while Finnegan makes Newbern's Nova run with ramp truck parts; it's three days of wrenching, two tracks and one unbelievable race.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern rescue an '67 Firebird that has been stowed in a barn.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich hit the road in the '68 Wreck Runner, a four-speed, 383ci clone made from the scraps of a '68 Road Runner and a '68 Satellite; it only has a few little issues; they hit the road to sort 'em out.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern take the barn-find '67 Firebird on an 800 mile road trip to race Freiburger and Dulcich in the Crusher Camaro.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan take on Dulcich and Newbern in a circle-track car shootout.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys rediscover and road trip the 1971 Chrysler eight-door airport car.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys take a road trip to Florida in an oil-guzzling '74 Toyota Hilux.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys acquire an awesome '70s Mullholland-racer-inspired Camaro.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys take the Rotsun, Nascarlo and Super Camaro to Laguna Seca Raceway.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys ride high as they test the Bubble on the dragstrip and off-road.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys deploy the Muscle Truck in the pits of a drag boat race.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys figure out how to stuff a 426ci Hemi into their 1975 AMC Gremlin.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys finish up The Hemi Gremmie and take it for its first road test.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys buy a sight-unseen '56 Nash stretched over a Toyota truck chassis.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Tony Angelo take the world's worst '68 to a whole new level!

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: At Roadkill Nights, the guys take a clean Duster and trade down each day.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The Rubber Duck Firebird goes on a 1,000-mile drag racing road trip.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The General Mayhem and the Death Metal Charger road trip to DirtFish.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys road trip a big-block 1980 Dodge Mirada to Du Quoin, Illinois.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys road trip two beaters to a deserted factory for a winter battle.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys' attempt at a Hemi Gremmie road trip is foiled by engine trouble.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan buy an '86 Trans Am and take it for its first road test on the drag-and-drive event Sick Week; with a swapped 350 V8 and a six-speed, the big question is whether they be able to make it faster each day or even finish the race.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Freiburger attempt to get a bucket-list '66 Corvette -- abandoned halfway through an LS swap and restoration -- back on the road. With multiple iterations and attempts, the 'Vette hasn't been on the road for 30 years. Will they change that?

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern light the tires as they road test their LS-powered '66 C2 Corvette from Oakland to Las Vegas with the smokiest burnouts ever. Follow along as they blaze the coast and hit the drag strip with Dulcich before breaking down in Sin City.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Steve finds a '71 Pontiac T-37 at a junkyard in Idaho; Mike and David take their time reviving a motor that's been sitting for 38 years.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern give new life to a '57 Chevy Bel Air that was pulled from a junkyard after more than 30 years. The guys drop in a small-block V8 and turbo 350 to get the car back on the pavement for a bumpy road trip back to where it came from.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Freiburger and Finnegan meet up with Derek Bieri to take a 1968 big-block Dart on a tire-smoking road trip, which includes a final run down Memphis International Raceway and some high-speed passes down George Ray's Wildcat Dragstrip.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan and Newbern revive the '73 Chevy Ramp Truck.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Finnegan surprises Freiburger by fixing up the Gremmie for Roadkill Nights.
